hi,

open_scoreboard on server/scoreboard.c says:

    /* We don't want to have to recreate the scoreboard after
     * restarts, so we'll create a global pool and never clean it.
     */
     rv = apr_pool_create(&global_pool, NULL);

This was added on rev 93159.
http://svn.apache.org/viewvc?view=rev&revision=93159

but the pool passed to open_scoreboard is not pconf after rev 94039.
http://svn.apache.org/viewvc?view=rev&revision=94039
